tool_description: Easily extract and download videos, audios, and reels from Facebook with the Facebook Video Audio Reels Downloader API. This API allows you to fetch various formats and download links for Facebook videos, making it convenient to integrate Facebook video downloading capabilities into your applications, services, or platforms.
name: Facebook Video Audio Reels Downloader
title: Facebook Video Audio Reels Downloader

api_list.name: Audio Download Link
api_list.description: Retrieve the audio download link for a Facebook video, allowing users to download only the audio content from the video.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-video-audio-reels-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/audio"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facebook-video-audio-reels-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: SD Download Link
api_list.description: Obtain the standard-definition (SD) download link for a Facebook video, enabling users to download the video in a lower quality format.

api_list.name: All Download Links and Information
api_list.description: Retrieve all available download links and information for a Facebook video, including video, audio, and reels.
